job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software engineering tasks focused on building and scaling platform services, which aligns with the definition of developing robust software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the integration of AI models into existing systems to enhance functionality, fitting the definition of integrating AI features into a product.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of taking business or domain requirements and translating them into technical solutions, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration within engineering teams to build complete solutions, a fundamental aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers
job_tasks.justification: These are all standard software engineering practices related to code quality, team development, and mentorship.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration and understanding requirements, which falls under communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates collaboration with other teams, a key aspect of communication and collaboration.
Mentoring involves communication, guidance, and knowledge sharing, fitting the definition of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in strategic planning and understanding business goals, aligning with Business Understanding & Strategy.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (designing, developing, scaling platforms and services, code reviews, mentoring) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions leveraging AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense, the core focus remains on building and integrating these into a security platform. There are no specific tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it builds software that directly uses AI/ML features.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, which are predominantly focused on software engineering with the integration of AI. The tasks described align well with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, and there is no ambiguity regarding the core nature of the role.
